english_example_sentence: If I speak about this difficult situation with you, my mind would be at ease.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы я поговорил с тобой об этой сложной ситуации, мне стало бы легче.
turkish_example_sentence: Ben bu zorlu durumu seninle konuşsam, içim rahatlar.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Ben bu zorlu durumu seninle ______, içim rahatlar.
